page.title: 19FLOWERS AND TREES
page.content: We identified 98 different kinds of flowers without looking at sub-species.The banks and lanes are especially beautiful in springtime with{snowdrops,primroses}and{daffodils followed quickly by{bluebells}and{pink {campion.}Conservationists have persuaded the Highways department to delay cutting until plants have seeded thus ensuring the future.The most common tree is the{oak,}60% of those counted,with {sycamore,ash}and{beech} about equally distributed.There are two rather rare wild{service }trees in Berry Lane.The Romans used the berries in brewing.Could these be descendants of some brought to the fort?In the forestry areas the more quickly growing conifers have been planted over about the last 30 years.
